meanings.definition: A fleet of warships or other vessels.
meanings.sent1: The armada of ships sailed bravely into battle.
meanings.sent2: The naval armada patrolled the waters to protect the coast.
meanings.sent3: The armada of rubber ducks in the bathtub made bath time fun.
meanings.sent4: The armada of clouds filled the sky, ready to unleash a storm.
meanings.sent5: The armada of ants marched in a straight line, carrying food back to their nest.

meanings.definition: A large group or collection of something, typically used to describe a large number of vehicles or objects.
meanings.sent1: An armada of bicycles crowded the bike rack outside the school.
meanings.sent2: The armada of shopping carts blocked the entrance to the store.
meanings.sent3: The armada of balloons filled the room, creating a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The armada of books on the shelf seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent5: The armada of cars in the parking lot made finding a spot challenging.
